body_html: I couldn't reproduce this. Did you have to use a specific set of weights? maybe setting the random seed in your repro torch.manual_seed(seed) # seed is an integer will help me reproduce the issue.

body: I couldn't reproduce this. Did you have to use a specific set of weights? maybe setting the random seed in your repro `torch.manual_seed(seed) # seed is an integer` will help me reproduce the issue.
